analysis.key_quote: Changing positions over to political appointees will remove expertise, weaken the independence of these agencies, encourage partisanship, and allow the government to impose its will through agencies that have traditionally operated on the basis of professionalism and service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed changes, highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service positions and the potential loss of expertise and independence in government agencies. It emphasizes the importance of merit-based systems and the integrity of scientific decision-making.
